head.title: Add tables to {{FileFormatUp}} documents using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, developers can quickly integrate tables into documents and emails, pulling data from dynamic sources.

header.title: Easily populate tables in {{FileFormatUp}} files with our {{EnvNameShort}} API
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} simplifies the process of filling tables in {{FileFormatUp}} documents with data from various inputs.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdFullName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a tool for generating documents and reports by automatically inserting data into pre-designed templates. You can effortlessly add tables, lists, charts, and images. Its advanced features allow you to precisely place content within your documents. Compatible with over 50 file types, including PDF, MS Office, and email formats.

more_features.title: Create documents with data-filled tables
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} makes it simple to automate table creation in your documents. It also supports adding elements like charts, lists, and images using templates.

feature_1.title: Generate reports from multiple data formats
feature_1.content: The API works seamlessly with JSON, XML, CSV, and other formats to fill tables in your documents with organized data.

feature_2.title: Present information visually
feature_2.content: {{ProdShortName}} helps you build professional tables, lists, and charts, as well as insert links, text, and images, for a polished look.

feature_3.title: Place table content with precision
feature_3.content: Use flexible LINQ-based syntax to add rows and columns dynamically. Customize appearance, such as font styles and colors, programmatically.

feature_4.title: Compatible with multiple formats
feature_4.content: Work with MS Office, OpenOffice, PDF, HTML, and more. Merge tables into any supported file format effortlessly.

formats.title: Produce detailed tables in various formats
formats.description: With {{EnvName}}, you can populate templates with data and generate detailed reports in over 50 file types.

operations.title: Key features at a glance
operations.description: Our API simplifies creating professional documents by automating table population alongside other powerful components.

examples.comment_1: Use these tags in a table row placeholder within your template
examples.comment_2: Define the path to the template file
examples.comment_3: Load data from your chosen source
examples.comment_4: Save the output file with the table populated

steps.title: Steps to insert data into a {{FileFormatUp}} table

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) helps you populate table templates for {{FileFormatUp}} and other formats. Use dynamic data from your sources to create tables with ease.
content.step_1: Set up a {{FileFormatUp}} template with placeholders for table rows and columns.
content.step_2: Pull data from any supported input source.
content.step_3: Filter or preprocess the data to match your needs.
content.step_4: Generate the final document with the completed table.

code_1.title: Dynamically create a data-filled table
code_1.content: This example shows how to populate a table in a {{FileFormatUp}} document using dynamic input data.
code_1.comment_1: Design a template with a placeholder for the table
code_1.comment_3: Load data from your preferred source
code_1.comment_4: Prepare a data object containing the necessary fields
code_1.comment_6: Save the document with the table populated

texts_pdf.step_1: Design a template with placeholders for the table (PDF templates are not currently supported).
texts_pdf.step_4: Save the document with the table filled in as a PDF file.
texts_pdf.comment_tmp: PDF templates are not supported at this time.
